features: ORIGINAL SAUCER CHAIR DESIGN: Settle into a seat that loves you back and is designed to fit your body. A saucer chair designed in a gorgeous neutral black color that will suit any room décor. Featuring a silver sturdy metal frame to compliment its look. Add additional seating to living rooms, bedrooms, rec rooms or any room with this saucer chair. Designed in a simple bold color that will add a pop of color to any room you decide to put it in. Add a fun and cozy touch to any room you desire with this super soft faux fur saucer chair!.No assembly required

COMFY AND COZY: Provide a convenient place for friends or family to sit with this ultra-cozy and comfy saucer chair. This saucer chair is sure to become everyone's favorite spot to sit or lounge in. The coziness that you will experience with this saucer chair will be one of your favorite reasons to sit and relax in it. This saucer chair is designed for maximum comfort and durability. Furthermore, this saucer chair is designed to support and wrap your body in the coziest way possible.

FAUX FUR MATERIAL: Covered in super soft faux fur to add to this saucer chairs touch and coziness. A material that makes it so comfortable to relax and to just enjoy the moment in. The durable soft material on this saucer chair will be the reason you will not want to get up. Covered in 100% faux fur fabrication. Additionally, this saucer chair will stay sturdy and beautiful for years to come. For easy care, spot clean only.

FOLDABLE: A foldable steel frame supports up to 225 lbs and folds flat when not in use, making it easy to hide this faux fur saucer chair out of sight without taking up a significant amount of room in tight spaces. This saucer chair also has a safety locking mechanism on the leg for added support. This saucer chair is easy to transport around making it an item that is easy to carry. Carry this saucer chair with you to your next destination, as it is also travel friendly.

DIMENSIONS: This super soft saucer chair measures 29'' H x 32'' W x 22'' D. The edge of the front seat is 14” from the floor, and seat is 16” deep and has 19” back. An ideal perfect size for kids, teens, and young adults. The sizing of this chair is designed at its absolute best making this faux fur saucer chair a practical multifunctional purchase.
body.description: Update your bedroom or dorm with this soft and fluffy Faux Fur Saucer Chair. Super comfortable, this black and plush folding chair is perfect for reading, watching TV or just relaxing. This cozy saucer chair is a perfect decorative addition to update any room. Chair easily folds up and can be stored without taking up much space when not in use. No assembly required. 100% Faux Fur fabrication. Sturdy metal frame. Spot clean only. Dimensions: 29'' x 22'' x 32''. Suitable for lounging, dorms or any room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, fuzzy and big
reviews.reviewText: This is great chair for a tween. Purchased it for 10 year old birthday and she loves it for reading. Very nice quality although the box it arrived in was is terrible condition and barely holding together. Had to return the first chair as it was damaged but second one was great! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome chair. Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying this chair is far beyond what I expected it to b. I got this chair because I'm redoing my room and I wAnted a cheap alternative to a small couch. This chair is the perfect thing. The one thing I would suggest is maybe getting a footrest or something to put ur feet on if like to sit with your feet up and leaning back (like me;)).THE FUR- so I just wanna say, when I ordered this I expected the fur to be poor quality fur that matted together from sweat and sitting on it. On the contrary it's super soft and seems like it would be really easy to clean. The fur has no smell, nor does it get gross if u sit on it for a long time.THE SIZE- so when I was thinking of buying a saucer chair, I wanted a big that I would be able to curl up in. I stuck with this one. It's the perfect size. You can't really curl up in it, but it's super cozy and big enough to have room to sit on your side and lean all the way back. It's not too low but it's low enough that u can stretch you feet out on the floor and still be comfortable for an average 5 foot and up height. Little kids can curl up in and my siblings love to read in it. Another plus is the folding. Whenever I need the space i can just fold it and put it away and my room looks bigger. It's super convenient.THE LOOK- so this saucer chair is perfect for a bedroom, dorm room, living room, etc. It gives off a sleek look and doesn't look cheap at all, which is a big plus, since it was pretty cheap :). My dad loves this chair so much he's thinking of buying some more for the whole house! (I got it for my room)All in all, i think this is a wonderful buy you can't go wrong with. If you're looking for something to cozy up in this is the perfect chair. It's cheap cute convenient and super comcortable.UPDATE- so I have been using this chair for just a week and I love it but after constant use for abt three days the fur ripped from the top. It's no biggie I'm just gonna see it back but I'm taking off one star for that. Obviously not so good for big people since I only weigh 110 pounds.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with item
reviews.reviewText: The item is good but the package was damaged when delivered. Thank God.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good while it lasted
reviews.reviewText: Don't get it twisted, the chair was fantastic...for about a month. Then it, literally, felt apart under me. I only used this chair for one thing, to sit in. Unfortunately, it only made it one month. I was about 280lbs at the time, and even then, I didn't really sit in this thing like that and not for any extended period of time.Good news is, the chair felt amazing to sit in. The material was nice and cozy and I believe I took a quick nap in it once because I was so comfortable. It made for a wonderful chair in my room and my guests loved it when we watched movies or played games. One thing they didn't like was the inability to eat in the chair due to the chair's incline. Given the material, I'm glad no one felt inclined to eat in the chair, or else I may have had to deal with stains and crumbs all the time. So that's a plus for me.However, take note that this material will make you hot and your legs sweat if you sit in it with or without pants, respectively. Although it isn't super thick faux fur, there's enough there to raise your butt's temperature a few degrees.Ultimately, it was good while it lasted. I can't think of a way to improve the longevity other than using a different material for the legs. But I'm not a chair scientist, so I'm not exactly sure what caused the frame to give out after only a month of occasional use. Be that as it may, the price tag fits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for kids
reviews.reviewText: My kids like it but watch out for their fingers if they're trying to carry and move it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Comfy Chair
reviews.reviewText: This was smaller than expected but not because of the description, just my own judgment based on the picture.The faux fur is soft and the black color looks good. It seems to be relatively sturdy- I've had students of all sizes/builds/weight sit in it and it has held up just fine.It doesn't sink as deep back as some saucer chairs but still seems to create a comfy position to sit in.Overall, was worth the price despite me wishing it were bigger!

I actually love this chair. For $60, it’s adult sized and genuinely comfy. Not much booty room though so if you have some behind maybe steer clear. I almost wish it would tilt back a bit more and this might not be as much of a problem. Either way, I love the build and softness and that it folds up. I am considering getting another one for my roommate since my cats claimed this one 2 minutes after I set it up the first time.Only negative was that the box it came in was all but destroyed and opened by the time it got to my door. Seller may need to package it more securely in future!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ahorra espacio y si no la estás usando la doblas y listo
reviews.reviewText: Es práctico, fue para la recamara de mi hijo y no quería restar espacio y que tuviera algo para sentarse a ver la televisión, que no sea la cama, me gustó mucho, cumple el objetivo

La tela es suavecita, el tamaño perfecto. No pesa nada y es facil de transportar. El color es el negro más obscuro de las imágenes, no el gris. Aunque el asiento queda más chaparrito que el de un sillón promedio, aguanta perfecto el peso de un adulto normal, y como quedas reclinado, la postura es mu cómoda. El asiento está cosido con unas tiras de tela alrededor del armazón y no puede quitarse sin descoserlas y volverlas a coser.
Its comfortable, sturdy, and great value for money. Im a 5’5 female about 170lbs and i can sit comfortably. Wonderfully surprised, as i was a bit skeptical after looking over the reviews.
